summary: REQ-26/27/28 appear implemented via SiteHeader active/hover underline styling, new MorshidButton wrapper + global hover shadow rules, and new MorshidCard wrapper with white background/shadow/rounded corners and per-card colored top borders. REQ-29 (alternating section backgrounds using exactly white/#F5F5F5/#E8F5E9 across all pages) is not directly evidenced in the provided (truncated) page diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Adjust section background styling across all pages so major sections alternate between white, light gray (#F5F5F5), and light green (#E8F5E9) for visual variety.
missing_requirements.reason: The visible portions of HomePage/ForFarmersPage show sections using bg-white (and hero uses an image), but the diff excerpts do not show the required alternation pattern nor the explicit use of #F5F5F5 and #E8F5E9. Because the files are truncated, this requirement cannot be confirmed as implemented from the provided evidence.
